climbs.name: Novus Ordo Seclorum
climbs.fa: Troy Mayr, Kelley Penix and Stan Roy, 1991

content.description: Climb up into the wide slot between the Pyramid and the huge boulder sitting at it's base. After clipping the very high 1st bolt, pull onto the wall and climb up on positive, but reachy features. A high step and steep move at mid-height lead to the featured upper face and the anchors.
content.location: Right side of the Pyramid, behind the huge boulder at the base of the Pyramid.

climbs.name: Golden Dawn
climbs.fa: Troy Mayr, Kelley Penix & Kevin Mokracek, 1991

content.description: Begin climbing up the slab below a prominent bulge. Pull over the bulge on small pockets and incuts. A committing move between the 1st & 2nd bolts leads to featured face climbing over another easier, but thought provoking bulge and the anchors.

climbs.name: Bottled Violence
climbs.fa: Jack Marshall, Sam Owings & Troy Mayr, 1994

content.description:
Tricky climbing along edges and pockets up a slightly overhanging face that may prove to be more than a

minor threat

to your onsight. Sees little traffic but is high quality.
content.location:
Left side of the east face and just right of

A Touch of Evil

.
